title: Jo Stevens – 2021 Comments on Boris Johnson and European Super League
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport on 26 April 2021.
content:
Yet again Boris Johnson’s integrity and honesty are in question.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

The public has a right to know what exactly was promised to Manchester United by both officials and the Prime Minister.

If Boris Johnson gave the European Super League his backing and then publicly turned on the plan then the British people deserve a full, clear and immediate explanation and apology.
